name: Taxi Capitalist
description:
Made in 2 days at Spelinkubatorn GBG game-jam 2019 by
Anton Lindkvist (Programming), Heimer Ahnfelt (Programming), David Jensen (Programming),  August Alexandersson (Programming), Michael Sömnes (Music), Olle Wedenmark (Art) + a friend Taxi Capitalist

Taxi Corp is looker for a new owner, beat your fellow taxi drivers to own a majority stake in the company. Earn the share price by driving business people around the town with no regards to your colleagues and bystanders safety.
~~~
The goal of the game is to fill the meter at the top of the corporate headquarters buy buying stocks. Stocks increase in price for every purchase!

You can also instead spend money on upgrades by driving through the workshop. Upgrades cycle over time, so act quick.

Control every car with the Keyboard

Player 1: Red car / 1st from the left
WASD - To steer/drive
E - Buy stocks for the current going price!

Player 2: Yellow car / 2nd from the left
Arrow keys - To steer/drive
"-" (Swedish layout)  or "/" (US ISO layout) - Buy stocks

Player 3: Turquoise car / 3rd from the left
FCVB - To steer/drive
G - To buy stocks

Player 4: Purple car / 4th from the left
IJKL - To steer/drive
O - Buy stocks
